H0.text: Which Radio 2 DJ christened ‘Dallas’ character Lucy Ewing ‘The Poison Dwarf’. Chris Evans

H1.text: Which Radio 2 DJ christened ‘Dallas’ character Lucy Ewing ‘The Poison Dwarf’. Zoe Ball

H2.text: Which Radio 2 DJ christened ‘Dallas’ character Lucy Ewing ‘The Poison Dwarf’. Ken Bruce

H3.text: Which Radio 2 DJ christened ‘Dallas’ character Lucy Ewing ‘The Poison Dwarf’. Sir terry

A4.text: Lucy was nicknamed 'The Poison Dwarf' by Terry Wogan on his BBC Radio 2 show in the 1980s.
